sentences.english: Finally the Northwest Army's suppressing the Heavenly Gate Society marked the Red Spears' falling.
sentences.chinese: 西北軍對天門會的鎮壓標誌着紅槍會的衰亡。

sentences.english: Away to the west gate formation is purely natural, non-labor carved.
sentences.chinese: 西天門純粹是自然形成，非人工雕琢而成。

sentences.english: We climb from red gate until the zhongtian gate.
sentences.chinese: 我們從紅門一直到爬了中天門。

sentences.english: It keeps hot and some people spend night in Chao Tianmen tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 天氣持續高溫，一些人躲到朝天門隧道夜宿。

sentences.english: As in Shinkai"s previous works, Tenmon composes for this film"s soundtrack.
sentences.chinese: 和新海誠以前的作品一樣，天門負責電影的音樂。

sentences.english: Lactose is also identified as the best carbon source while asparagine the best nitrogen source.
sentences.chinese: 同時確定了乳糖爲最佳碳源，天門冬素爲最佳氮源。

sentences.english: Chaotianmen Square is a must for tourists at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 對於國內外的遊客來說，朝天門廣場是必遊之地。

sentences.english: In the toilet insisted "the door closed days", there chelating effect.

sentences.english: It is one of the two components of aspartame .

sentences.english: Tian Men Mountain Temple was first built in the Tang Dynasty as a center of Buddhism in the area of western Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 天門山寺始建於唐朝，是湘西地區的佛教中心。

sentences.english: Zhongtian Gate mountains wide valley, surrounded by pavilions.
sentences.chinese: 中天門峻嶺闊谷，樓閣簇擁。

sentences.english: Above its shadows heaven stood open.
sentences.chinese: 在它黑影之上，天門打開了。

sentences.english: Through years of learning and training he started his Sky-Door Maze.
sentences.chinese: 經過數年的學習及訓練，他開啓了天門陣。

sentences.english: His memory was trapped in his own amazing Sky-Door Maze.
sentences.chinese: 他的記憶被困在他那奇異的天門陣內。

sentences.english: Poly(aspartic acid) is a new kind of biodegradable scale inhibitor and corrosion inhibitor.
sentences.chinese: 聚天門冬氨酸是新一代可生物降解的綠色阻垢緩蝕劑。

sentences.english: This paper is the first investigation of the tourist market in Tianmen Mountain by using questionnaires.
sentences.chinese: 首次對天門山旅遊市場進行了問卷調查。
